results.title: Transdermal metformin hydrochloride-loaded cubic phases: in silico formulation optimization, preparation, properties, and application for local treatment of melanoma
results.text_hl: High antimelanoma effect of transdermal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@-loaded cubic phases also was shown by the significant decrease of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ volume and the improvement of @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cell apoptosis on the @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008546 @@@B16 melanoma@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
